metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5711 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: gd_gif_in.c in the GD Graphics Library (aka libgd), as used in PHP before 5.6.33, 7.0.x before 7.0.27, 7.1.x before 7.1.13, and 7.2.x before 7.2.1, has an integer signedness error that leads to an infinite loop via a crafted GIF file, as demonstrated by a call to the imagecreatefromgif or imagecreatefromstring PHP function. This is related to GetCode_ and gdImageCreateFromGifCtx.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> php uses the system libgd2

criterions.comment: libgd2 package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.5-4ubuntu1').
